## Basics of R

### R as a calculator


First, we'll learn how to use R as a calculator.

- Use the `+` sign to add 5 and 3

```{r add, exercise=TRUE}

```

```{r add-check}
grade_result(
  pass_if(~ identical(.result, 8))
)
```


- Use the `-` sign to subtract 3 from 5

```{r subtract, exercise=TRUE, exercise.lines = 5}

```

```{r subtract-check}
grade_result(
  pass_if(~ identical(.result, 2))
)
```
